entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -19.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -23.6°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
